page.title: 05My Day
page.content: I woke up one Saturday morning at half past seven,slowly I climbed out of bed. After letting our cat in I woke Tom,then we both descended the stairs. There was just enough to see by. I helped Tom dress. When mum and dad had got up we had breakfast it was not a thrilling breakfast only some bacon and sausages but it was tasty. After breakfast dad and I went to pull up weeds in the garden while mum and Tom did some baking. Dad and I worked away until our backs ached, when it was lunch time we had a salad. After lunch mum made a picnic. Then we went to the lake near the manor Tom and I rode our bikes, I left my bike hidden in a bush I ran off. I climbed up the bank. I climbed a tree beside the bank I crawled along a tough branch, mum and Tom had stopped to rest they were calling for me.I giggled I thought if
